barriers.name: Lack of Motivation
barriers.description: Student shows consistent disengagement and minimal effort

effectiveLevers.name: game_reward_system
steps: Offer game reward immediately after completion

effectiveLevers.name: ban_i_dont_know
steps: Explain that 'I don't know' is not acceptable
Frame as 'What do you think?' or 'Make a guess'

barriers.name: Confrontational Showoff Pattern
barriers.description: Student gains status by being confrontational and taking teachers to pieces

effectiveLevers.name: micro_goal_celebration
effectiveLevers.description: Every small goal is a victory - lower bar to ground level
steps: Find ANY tiny thing to recognize

effectiveLevers.name: non_work_relationship
effectiveLevers.description: Chat is not all about work - build human connection
steps: Show interest in their life outside class
Talk about their interests and hobbies

barriers.name: Silent Avoider (Hider)
barriers.description: Student stays quiet and does nothing, hoping to be overlooked

effectiveLevers.name: shoulder_sitting_intensive_support
effectiveLevers.description: Massive time investment with constant proximity
steps: Start with tiniest tasks: 'Write your name'
Never give up, never move on to avoid pain

barriers.name: Quiet Playful Avoider
barriers.description: Student prefers play and social interaction, quietly avoids work without confrontation

effectiveLevers.name: play_at_their_level
effectiveLevers.description: Meet them in their play space without shame
steps: Gradually introduce work elements into play

effectiveLevers.name: play_break_graduation
effectiveLevers.description: Structured progression from play to work with gradual extension
steps: Stage 1: Work 5 min → 5 min play break
Stage 2: Work until natural break → play reward
Stage 3: Exam period concentration (no breaks during task)

barriers.name: High Achiever / Model Student
barriers.description: Student with strong home support and baseline motivation, but risks burnout

effectiveLevers.name: mental_health_override
effectiveLevers.description: Push back against constant work panic explicitly
steps: Identify students in constant work mode
Direct conversation: 'You need to stop sometimes'

effectiveLevers.name: advanced_content_feeding
effectiveLevers.description: Keep them interested with challenging material
steps: Provide access to advanced/university level content
Let them show off knowledge to parents
